clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Fluorodopa F 18 is indicated for use with positron emission tomography PET to visualize dopaminergic nerve terminals in the striatum for the evaluation of adult patients with suspected Parkinsonian syndromes PS L12849

incompatibilities.description: The bioavailability of Fluorodopa 18F can be increased when combined with Carbidopa
The bioavailability of Fluorodopa 18F can be increased when combined with Methyldopa
The bioavailability of Fluorodopa 18F can be increased when combined with Benserazide
